attributes.action: End so-called Daylight Saving and introduce a single British Standard Time (GMT+1)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many of us are unhappy, in one way or another, with the current system of changing the clocks twice a year, and there is ample evidence that a change could bring many benefits - not least in terms of lives and energy saved. I suggest doing away with changing our clocks at all, and simply sticking to a single "British Standard Time" of GMT plus one hour. What say you?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
